text: Machino () is a rural locality (a village) in Klyapovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 104 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located on the Barda River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Machino (Klyapovskoye Rural Settlement), Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
